review: You get a lot of features for $100 here if you own all mac products. The missing star here is the technical limitations for more experienced users and a far too simplified interface.And for all you non-geeks, make sure you read up on what you can and can not airplay. Far too many people buy this device thinking they are going to airplay NFL games or HBOGO. Not the case. I knew this before purchase, but it seems many people did not.Mac people, you'll want to look into buying an app for your computer called AirParrot. Solvs a huge second screen/mirroring issue.

review: Recently I purchased this unit to be able to use the share function between the new devices.  I currently have the older 160GB Apple TV with the hard drive.  This one is small and sleek and doesn't seem to use as much energy as the prior one.  I did notice when using uTube and watching trailers that it was a bit sluggish compared to the older one I have.  I'm going to give it a few more try's and update.  I only took away one star due to the sluggishness and having to sometime wait for a Trailer to download.  in the past, I didn't have to wait as long.

author: R. Madden "Russ"

review: I purchased this so I could watch Netflix and Hulu Plus on our newly-purchased 55" LED/LCD TV.  Little did I realize I probably didn't need it after all, as most late model TVs these days already have these same apps/WiFi built in.  Not so bad, considering the price.  Also the owner of several iPhones, iPads, and MacBook Pros, Apple TV does allow seamless streaming of content right from your Apple devices, so easier to share stuff on your big screen with effortless setup and implementation.Recommend if you have several Apple devices and want to avoid incompatibility between those and your TV.  Don't need this if you own Android-based or PC-based devices as it will do nothing for you...not compatible.  Only reason to purchase if you are Android/PC is if you don't have a TV that is has these same content apps (NetFlix, YouTube, HuluPlus, etc.) already built in to the TV.
